subject: Fashion
title: Christian Dior's New Look Impact
description: One-minute skill: Christian Dior's New Look Impact.

hook.text: In 1947, one fashion show made every wardrobe obsolete overnight. Christian Dior lit the fuse.

buildup.text: After years of boxy wartime clothes, Dior unveiled cinched waists, padded hips, and sweeping skirts.

discovery.text: Harper's Bazaar editor Carmel Snow declared it a 'New Look.' The name stuck and a revolution began.

twist.text: Women who'd built planes during the war were furious. Dior was pushing them back into tight shapes.

climax.text: He restored Paris as fashion capital after the war. One collection rebuilt an entire industry.

punchline.text: Dior didn't just change hemlinesâ€”he saved Paris.

quiz.question: What was the immediate cultural effect of Dior's 'New Look'?
options: It restored Paris as the global fashion capital after World War II
It ended all wartime fabric rationing across Europe
It introduced casual sportswear as everyday clothing
